title: [1993] Their Greatest Hits - Hot Chocolate - 179mb @ 320kbs
description:
Their Greatest Hits - Hot Chocolate [1993]

The UK band Hot Chocolate were regular visitors to the UK Top Ten 
right through the 1970s. I Believe (In Love) from 1971 is an oh so 
gentle, wistful song with melodious organ lines and a male voices 
that caresses the soul, Emma from about 1974 is a passionate dirge 
that tells the tragic story of Emmaline and So You Win Again was 
their huge top 5 hit from 1978. My other favourites here include You 
Sexy Thing, Love Is Life, I'll Put You Together Again and their 
other massive hit, Every 1's A Winner. The lead singer's smooth warm 
voice wraps itself perfectly around the synth-based instrumentation 
and all of the songs are tuneful and memorable. Hot Chocolate were 
perhaps the UK's premier soul band in the seventies, consistently 
scoring hits, even during the disco era when they mastered the form 
in their song Disco Queen. If they weren't a British band, I would 
have expected them to be on the Stax label! Yes, this music is that 
good and Hot Chocolate's sound compares well with the best of 
Motown and Stax/Volt's romantic songs. This is a wonderful collection 
and Errol Brown's voice is smooth and sexy
